name: swarm

effect.sun_moon: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Increases the frequency of cries heard on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Strengthens bug moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon’s HP is low.
